0.Pros: Probably one of the better first job options for high school kids. Extremely flexible schedule, 1/2 meals for any shift, ability to learn lots of various skills regarding proper communication between fellow associates and managers.
0.Cons: Pay will obviously be extremely low. Some customer interactions will make you furious. Lunch time rushes are stressful. Smell of kitchen will haunt all of your clothes and skin.

1.Pros: Meet great people, the one I worked for was a franchise and the owner was very nice.
